Body:
if isinstance(rs1, np.random.RandomState):
    rs1 = rs1.get_state()
assert isinstance(rs1, tuple)
if isinstance(rs2, np.random.RandomState):
    rs2 = rs2.get_state()
assert isinstance(rs1, tuple)
assert len(rs1) == len(rs2)
equal = True
for x1, x2 in zip(rs1, rs2):
    test = x1 == x2
    if hasattr(test, '__array__'):
        test = test.all()
    equal &= test
return equal
